name: uMADbro (2013)
description:
Collect The Coins They Said......

In the Specified Amount of turns they Said...
Sounds Easy... I Said...

WRONG!!!!!

Play Through 48 Rage Worthy Level's and Earn Trophies with by Logging in with GameJolt

Just remember the Game Hates you... SO BE PREPARED FOR THE UNEXPECTED!!!

NOTE: All Levels have been Tested and are all Beatable
